title: Implement Widget Library UI with Add/Remove Controls
description:
Create the user interface for the widget library and widget add/remove functionality. Build on existing addWidgetFromLibrary/removeWidgetFromDashboard services to create interactive UI components. Implement widget library browser, add widget buttons, and remove controls with proper hover/focus states.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Creates widget library browser component showing all 5 available widget types
- Implements add widget functionality using existing dashboard-service.ts
- Provides remove controls that appear on hover/focus for each widget
- Shows empty state guidance when dashboard has no widgets
- Integrates with existing storage persistence system
- Provides visual feedback for add/remove operations
- Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility requirements
- Follows existing TypeScript patterns and 4-space indentation
- Includes comprehensive unit and integration tests
